duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through proactive business-to-business sales initiatives.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and revenue growth.
Engage in face-to-face networking to optimize the business owner's problem-solving of promoting and selling products or services.
Run point on maintaining client relationships for future revenue growth and renewal.
Communicate compellingly and persistently, bringing concepts to life to maintain a top position in sales.
Participate in critical business discussions and utilize a custom CRM platform for client acquisition.
